Package game

Interface Summary
GameController This will be used to add on a different ServerGameController to allow stepping through time.
 

Class Summary
ClientEventHandler This is where events will be sent through that will go through some initial checking and then be sent to the server from the client.
ClientGameController This class is used for all game specific control for the client.
ClientWorldState The ClientWorldState It's only job is to accurately reflect the server world.
ServerEventHandler Sorts and processes events that clients send in.
ServerGameController The main loop in charge of receiving events from clients, processing those events, and sending updates back to clients.
ServerWorldState The specific ServerWorldState of type WorldState.
WorldState An abstract world state that provides the shared functionality between the ClientWorldState and the ServerWorldState.
